      void AbstractArmature.ambitiousIKSolver​(AbstractBone bone, double dampening, int iterations)
      This solver aims to minimize the total distance to the target pins, however if the pins are impossible to reach AND the armature is under-constrained, this solver can become unstable.

      void AbstractArmature.tranquilIKSolver​(AbstractBone bone, double dampening, int iterations)
      Highly stable even when under-constrained, and also when over-constrained (by Kusudamas) Converges on a solution satisfying all pins and constraints where possible.
      protected void AbstractArmature.updateBoneTag​(AbstractBone bone, java.lang.String previousTag, java.lang.String newTag)
      The armature maintains an internal hashmap of bone name's and their corresponding bone objects.
